text:
Imagine walking in for a Lady Gaga concert and then suddenly seeing Bradley Cooper join her? Well, that's a kind of surprise many of us could actually kill anyone for.
This stroke of luck favoured L.A Audience who were enjoying a Lady Gaga concert. The 'A Star Is Born' Actors reunited at Las Vegas residency for a duet on "Shallow," which is also running in the race of winning the original song at the Academy Awards.
Twitter
The experience for the fans turned out to be enthralling and it began with a funny banter as they exchanged a conversation while Cooper took Gaga's to help him get his earpiece squared away.
Screengrab
Taking 'A Star Is Born' reference, Cooper said, "Jackson never used these.". After putting the ear plugs, he realised and said, "I can't hear anything."
After the music set up was done, the on-screen couple got comfortable as they started the Shallow duet. Why you might be suffering from a major FOMO for missing out this sort of experience, this video straight from L.A will make you feel covered. Watch now!

title: Bradley Cooper And Lady Gaga Surprise Her L.A Concert Audience With An Impromptu Duet On 'Shallow'
description: This stroke of luck favored the L.A Audience who were enjoying a Lady Gaga concert. The 'A Star Is Born' Actors reunited at Las Vegas residency for a duet on "Shallow," which is also running in the race of winning the original song at the Academy Awards on Feb. 24. The experience for the fans turned out to be enthralling and it began with a funny banter as they exchanged a conversation.
